name: Beem SMS
author: Beem Africa

sections.description:
Communicate with your customers via sms to improve sales and customer satisfaction.

How does it work?

Beem SMS integrates with our SMS Api at Beem to add support for text messaging.

Beem SMS allow you to send instant notifications to your woocommerce customers upon
receiving their orders, or updating them about the status of their orders.

  • Prerequisites
  1. Installation of WordPress
  2. Installation of WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Extract the zip file
  2. Copy the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Generate your api key and secret key from your Beem dashboard. Visit Beem for more details
sections.faq:
Does it support WooCommerce?

Yes, it does. We are continuously adding more events for WooCommerce such as Cart abandonment.

Can I do Y?

It depends, really. Please let us know what you would want, and we may take it into consideration.
